revised_title: Thermal Runaway and Criticality in Systems with Diminishing Reaction Rates: The Uniform Temperature (Semenov) Approximation
tldr: The authors model thermal runaway and criticality in systems with diminishing reaction rates under Newtonian (Semenov) conditions, where the internal temperature is uniform. They investigate the behavior of exothermic reactions with time-dependent rates and provide critical values for various parameters, contributing to a better understanding of complex chemical systems.
